DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety performance ProstaCare System relieve symptom urinary outflow obstruction secondary benign prostatic hyperplasia .
DOC.criteria: Key Enrolled subject must least 45 year age , diagnose BPH require intervention . Subject must symptom uroflowmetry result characteristic BPH . Prostate must sufficient size accommodate study device . Key Urethral morphology unable accommodate study device . Active urinary tract infection . Interest maintain fertility . Past history surgical intervention BPH . History current medical condition contraindicate elective urological procedure .
